concept.description: Creates a relation PRODUCES between a field and its type or a method and its return type if the parameter is annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.inject.Disposes.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member), (member)-[:OF_TYPE|RETURNS]->(type), (member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(producesType:Type) WHERE (member:Field or member:Method) and producesType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.inject.Produces" SET type:JEE:Injectable, member:JEE:BeanProducer MERGE (member)-[:PRODUCES]->(type) RETURN member AS Producer

concept.description: Creates a relation DISPOSES between a parameter and its type if the parameter is annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.inject.Disposes.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(disposeMethod:Method)-[:HAS]->(parameter:Parameter), (parameter)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(disposesType:Type), (parameter)-[:OF_TYPE]->(type:Type) WHERE disposesType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.inject.Disposes" MERGE (parameter)-[:DISPOSES]->(type) RETURN disposeMethod AS DisposeMethod

concept.description: Labels all annotation types annotated by @jakarta.inject.Qualifier with "CDI" and "Qualifier" and adds the labels "CDI" and "Nonbinding" to all non-binding annotation values (i.e. which are annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.util.Nonbinding).
concept.cypher: MATCH (qualifier:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(qualifierType:Type) WHERE qualifierType.fqn = "jakarta.inject.Qualifier" SET qualifier:CDI:Qualifier WITH qualifier MATCH (qualifier)-[:DECLARES]->(attribute:Method), (attribute)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(nonbindingType:Type) WHERE nonbindingType.fqn = "jakarta.enterprise.util.Nonbinding" SET attribute:CDI:Nonbinding RETURN distinct qualifier AS Qualifier

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.context.Dependent with "CDI" and "Dependent".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.context.Dependent" SET e:CDI:Dependent RETURN e AS DependentElement

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped with "CDI" and "RequestScoped".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped" SET e:CDI:RequestScoped RETURN e AS RequestScopedElement

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.context.SessionScoped with "CDI" and "SessionScoped".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.context.SessionScoped" SET e:CDI:SessionScoped RETURN e AS SessionScopedElement

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.context.ConversationScoped with "CDI" and "ConversationScoped".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.context.ConversationScoped" SET e:CDI:ConversationScoped RETURN e AS ConversationScopedElement

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped with "CDI" and "ApplicationScoped".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped" SET e:CDI:ApplicationScoped RETURN e AS ApplicationScopedElement

MATCH (type:Java:Type:Class)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotation:Type) WHERE annotation.fqn in [ "jakarta.enterprise.context.Dependent", "jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped", "jakarta.enterprise.context.SessionScoped", "jakarta.enterprise.context.ConversationScoped", "jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped" ] OR annotation:Stereotype SET type:CDI:JEE:Injectable RETURN type AS Injectable

MATCH (field:Java:Field)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotation:Type), (field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(fieldType:Java:Type) WHERE annotation.fqn in [ "jakarta.enterprise.context.Dependent", "jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped", "jakarta.enterprise.context.SessionScoped", "jakarta.enterprise.context.ConversationScoped", "jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped" ] OR annotation:Stereotype SET fieldType:CDI:JEE:Injectable RETURN fieldType AS Injectable

MATCH (method:Java:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotation:Type), (method)-[:RETURNS]->(returnType:Java:Type) WHERE annotation.fqn in [ "jakarta.enterprise.context.Dependent", "jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped", "jakarta.enterprise.context.SessionScoped", "jakarta.enterprise.context.ConversationScoped", "jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped" ] OR annotation:Stereotype SET returnType:CDI:JEE:Injectable RETURN returnType AS Injectable

concept.description: Labels all beans annotated by @jakarta.inject.Singleton with "CDI", "SingletonScoped", "JEE" and "Injectable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn = "jakarta.inject.Singleton" SET t:CDI:SingletonScoped:JEE:Injectable RETURN t AS cdiSingleton

concept.description: Labels all annotation types annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.inject.Stereotype with "CDI" and "Stereotype".
concept.cypher: MATCH (stereotype:Type:Annotation)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(stereotypeType:Type) WHERE stereotypeType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.inject.Stereotype" SET stereotype:CDI:Stereotype RETURN stereotype AS Stereotype

concept.description: Labels all types annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.inject.Alternative with "CDI" and "Alternative".
concept.cypher: MATCH (alternative:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(alternativeType:Type) WHERE alternativeType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.inject.Alternative" SET alternative:CDI:Alternative RETURN alternative AS Alternative

concept.description: Labels all types and methods annotated by @jakarta.enterprise.inject.Specializes with "CDI" and "Specializes".
concept.cypher: MATCH (specializes)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(specializesType:Type) WHERE (specializes:Type or specializes:Method) and specializesType.fqn="jakarta.enterprise.inject.Specializes" SET specializes:CDI:Specializes RETURN specializes AS Specialization

concept.description: Labels all fields annotated by @jakarta.decorator.Delegate with "CDI" and "Delegate".
concept.cypher: MATCH (delegate:Field)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(delegateType:Type) WHERE delegateType.fqn="jakarta.decorator.Delegate" SET delegate:CDI:Delegate RETURN delegate AS Delegate

concept.description: Labels all types annotated by @jakarta.decorator.Decorator with "CDI", "Decorator", "JEE" and "Injectable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (decorator:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(decoratorType:Type) WHERE decoratorType.fqn="jakarta.decorator.Decorator" SET decorator:CDI:Decorator:JEE:Injectable RETURN decorator AS Decorator

concept.description: Labels all beans declaring "InjectionPoint" of type "jakarta.enterprise.event.Event" with "CDI" and "EventProducer".
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member:Field:CDI:InjectionPoint), (member)-[:OF_TYPE]->(injectType:Type) WHERE injectType.fqn = "jakarta.enterprise.event.Event" SET a:CDI:EventProducer RETURN DISTINCT a.fqn AS cdiEventProducers

concept.description: Labels all beans declaring method that has parameter of type "jakarta.enterprise.event.Observes" with "CDI" and "EventConsumer".
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member:Method)-[:HAS]->(param:Parameter), (param)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(injectType:Type) WHERE injectType.fqn = "jakarta.enterprise.event.Observes" SET a:CDI:EventConsumer RETURN DISTINCT a.fqn AS cdiEventConsumer

concept.description: Labels all types or methods annotated by "jakarta.inject.Named" with "CDI" and "Named".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(namedType:Type) WHERE namedType.fqn = "jakarta.inject.Named" SET e:CDI:Named RETURN e AS Named

concept.description: Labels all elements annotated by "jakarta.enterprise.inject.Default" with "CDI" and "Default".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(defaultType:Type) WHERE defaultType.fqn = "jakarta.enterprise.inject.Default" SET e:CDI:Default RETURN e AS Default

concept.description: Labels all elements annotated by "jakarta.enterprise.inject.Any" with "CDI" and "Any".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(anyType:Type) WHERE anyType.fqn = "jakarta.enterprise.inject.Any" SET e:CDI:Any RETURN e AS Any

concept.description: Labels all elements annotated by "jakarta.enterprise.inject.New" with "CDI" and "New".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(newType:Type) WHERE newType.fqn = "jakarta.enterprise.inject.New" SET e:CDI:New RETURN e AS New
